research_project_title.ja: 炭素と塩素を含む物質循環解明と素材開発

description.ja: 地球の3圏において動的反応で状態変化する炭素と塩素の地球以外対比による物質循環と海水起源解明をめざし、さらに新しい炭酸ガス固定科学技術を進め、新材料物質のナノテク開発に応用する。

research_project_title.en: Impact formation of Akiyoshi & Takamatsu structures

description.en: Akiyoshi limestone breccias and Takamatsu buried structure which have meteoritic Fe,Ni,Co elements and/or shocked quartz in drilled samples are related by meteoritic impact events at PT bd age or 15Ma of Japan island formation age, respectively.

research_project_title.en: Dynamic circulation process and material application of C and Cl-bearing materials on the Earth and artificial products

description.en: Dynamic circulation process of C and Cl-bearing materials on the Earth, the Moon, Mars and artificial products which can be applied to C and CO2-fixing processes.

Material reaction by Laser-shocked metamorphism shows
abrasive process with micro-particles and change states
of materials with nano-technology.
